short_description: Height Adjustable: Customize your sound thanks to 10 inches of height adjustment. Now you can mount your speakers directly at ear level, just twist the collar and adjust from 28 to 38 inches. No tools required!

Premium Design: Built from heavy-gauge steel, these speaker stands will help deliver top quality sound while keeping your speakers safe. The wide base helps prevent against bumps or falls, and included felt pads minimize vibration.

DIY Installation: Easy as 1, 2, 3. This speaker stands pair come with everything you need to take your speakers to new heights, including hardware, base pads and different mounting brackets for your unique setup.

name: Adjustable Speaker Wall Mounts, 55 lbs Capacity, Dual Speaker Wall Stands for Most Bookshelf Speakers, Fits Speakers with Widths Ranging from 5.1” to 11.2”,Black, 1 Pair
short_description: 55lbs Weight Capacity - Each speaker wall mount boasts a robust 55lbs weight capacity, easily supporting your valuable bookshelf speakers without wobbling or risk of damage, ensuring long-lasting stability for your gear. Designed specifically to fit most bookshelf speaker models on the market, it eliminates the hassle of searching for size-specific mounts, making it a versatile solution that seamlessly adapts to your existing equipment—ideal for optimizing space and keeping your speakers securely in place while enhancing your listening experience.

Fits 5.1” to 11.2” Width Speakers - Optimize your audio setup with Pegzone 1 Pair Speaker Wall Mount, designed for flexibility and protection. It fits speakers with widths ranging from 5.1” to 11.2”, easily adapting to most standard speaker sizes without extra tools or adapters. Plus, built-in protective pads create a buffer between the mount, your speakers, and walls, preventing scratches on both your audio gear and wall surfaces—keeping your setup looking neat and intact while ensuring a secure fit.

Take Full Control of Your Sound Direction - Enjoy ±10° tilt to angle sound up or down for optimal listening, 360° rotation to swivel speakers fully for multi-room coverage, and ±45° swivel to adjust side-to-side positioning. Whether you’re watching movies, gaming, or listening to music, Pegzone speaker wall mount lets you customize the soundstage to match your space—ensuring every seat gets the best audio experience.

Create Immersive Surrounded Sound - Elevate your audio experience and reclaim space with our Speaker Wall Mount! It minimizes unnecessary vibrations that distort sound, locking in clearer, crisper audio—whether you’re streaming music, watching movies, or gaming. By mounting speakers on the wall, it frees up valuable desktop, shelf, or floor space, decluttering your living area while keeping your gear secure.

Effortless Installation - Setting up your speaker wall mount has never been easier. The package includes a detailed user manual along with a step-by-step installation video to guide you through the entire process. Whether you're a DIY beginner or an experienced installer, you'll find the setup smooth, quick, and frustration-free—so you can start enjoying your enhanced sound experience in no time.
